sections.title: I'm a software engineer
sections.description: I focus on desktop and web applications, as well as some hobbyist embedded system projects. I majored in computer science in college, and currently work as a front-end developer at a research lab. My preferred technologies are JavaScript(React, TypeScript, Redux), Scala, and Python.

sections.title: I live in Milwaukee, WI
sections.description: I'm originally from Colorado, but this cold instills fear.

sections.title: I enjoy a crowd
sections.description: Speaking in front of a room filled with strangers, giving a presentation, or shamelessly singing Beyonce's "Halo" in a crowded karaoke bar are all activities I love doing.

sections.title: Sarcasm is life
sections.description: Over 50% of what comes out of my mouth is 9000% sarcastic. If you were to ask me, "Joe, what time is it?" And I didn't respond by saying "it's time for you to get a watch," then something's probably wrong.

sections.title: I mix EDM
sections.description: I create music with Logic Pro X in my spare time, but it's pretty out there. Like me. And them cats 'vibin.
